entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then clearing. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon.
